title: Select Budget Committee Session II 8/5/20
description:
In-person attendance is currently prohibited per the Washington Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.8, et seq., until September 1, 2020. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and Seattle Channel online.

Agenda: CB 119825: 2020 Budget - SPD related Amendments (continued from Session I); CB 119818: Adjustments to 2020 Budget; Res: 31952: adopting revised financial policies for the Cumulative Reserve Subfund of the General Fund; CB 119823: relating to the 2018 Families, Education, Preschool, and Promise Levy; CB 119822: relating to the 2020 Budget - Seattle Department of Transportation; Res 31951: authorizing an exception to the level of General Fund support to Seattle Parks and Recreation.

Advance to a specific part
CB 119825: 2020 Budget - SPD related Amendments (continued from Session I) - 1:10

CB 119818: Adjustments to 2020 Budget - 2:21:37

Res: 31952: adopting revised financial policies for the Cumulative Reserve Subfund of the General Fund - 2:28:00
CB 119823: relating to the 2018 Families, Education, Preschool, and Promise Levy - 2:35:10

CB 119822: relating to the 2020 Budget - Seattle Department of Transportation - 2:37:48

Res 31951: authorizing an exception to the level of General Fund support to Seattle Parks and Recreation - 2:39:15
